COMMENT: 64bit UNIX epoch timestamp
Reporting MAC, device-type and fw-version
Format: shrooly-XXXXXX, where the Xs represent the last 6 characters of the MAC address
Error codes, custom format
Writing a '1' here restores the device to factory settings
Writing a '1' here resets the device
Default unit: C, Measured value is multiplied by 100: 35.56C is represented as 3556
Default unit: RH%, Measured value is multiplied by 100: 64.56% is represented as 6456
Default unit: %, Measured value is multiplied by 100: 25.60% is represented as 2560
VBUS Voltage measured as volts at the DC input
Status of the 4 buttons (1 bit each), left ro right
Raw water level capacitance
Ventilation fan duty cycle, 0-100%
Ventilation fan speed, 0-10000 RPM
Manual control, will be deprc
White LED brightness, 0-100%
Turns the humidifer on/off, 0/1
1 byte for each color component (R, G, B).
0-OFF, 1-STATIC, 2-BLINK, 3-BREATHE
0 = off. Multiplied by 10, actual range is 100-10kHz
0-OFF, 1-ON
Used to initiate and control the update process. 0-IDLE, 1-REQUEST OTA, 0-DONE
1 - starts a file transfer, 2 - cancel any pending file transfers. All other commands are undefined.
Read-only attribute that defines how large files the ESP32 can handle.
Write the expected total length of the file in bytes to this characteristic before sending the command to transfer a file.
Each data block is written here during the transfer.
CRC32 checksum that you expect for the file here before you trigger the transfer. http://home.thep.lu.se/~bjorn/crc/
Write the name of the file before starting the transfer.
0 - file transfer succeeded; 1 - error, 2 - a file transfer is in progress, 3. - IDLE (no action, no transfer)
File delete, will be deprc.
File transfer rename, will be deprc
Read or select and start a cultivation program, writing an empty string stops the current program
0 - idle, 1 - program is running without errors, 2 - not found, 3 - stopped because error, 4 - finish
